< About Me />

I'm a junior developer who's spent the last few years learning the ins and outs of our industry. My primary focus is deliverance of optimized, user-friendly experiences for customers and co-workers alike. I'm very fimilar with modern software standards and love developing new code. Describing me as calculated would be an understament. Below, you'll find few of many diversified projects I've orchestrated on my free time.
What you see here is a work in progress and a first draft at that.

Business Name or Tagline

This is a template that is great for small businesses. It doesn't have too much fancy flare to it, but it makes a great use of the standard Bootstrap core components. Feel free to use this template for any project you want!

Canabis Point System

Built with React-Native, C# ASP.net Core (REST API), and MYSQL (AWS S3).

Wow... That was a mouthful.

The primary purpose of this app is to store points for a user after making in-store purchases. After so many points are accumulated, discounts on purchases are avaliable. Admins may also promote special offers!

Dynamic Wallpapers for Windows Terminal WSL

You're still using blue screen terminals? This simple bash script I've written can improve your day-to-day quality of life with dynamic terminal wallpapers. Just add the script to your '.bashrc' profile, pick a few of your favorite pictures, and let the magic happen!

TD Ameritrade Auto Investor

Despite lacking a front end, this auto-investor written in Python is highly configurable and versitile. After punching in your login credendials to a file, simply feed the program your desired stocks via a TD Ameritrade Watchlist. If your configured criteria is met, the program will fulfill your closing or opening orders.
